____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isGlobalChatEnabled = ([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[select]] 0; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>check if user can use text on global channel</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isGlobalVoiceEnabled = ([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[select]] 1; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>check if user can use the VoN on global channel</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[params]] ["_isGlobalChatEnabled", "_isGlobalVoiceEnabled"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>sets both variables</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
